name: ai-quant-trader-cskill
description: AI-powered quantitative trading system with technical analysis, sentiment analysis, factor models, risk management, and strategy backtesting
author: Agent-Skill-Creator

plugins.name: ai-quant-trader
plugins.description: AI Quant Trader Pro provides comprehensive stock analysis including technical indicators (MA, RSI, MACD, Bollinger Bands), pattern recognition, sentiment analysis, multi-factor scoring, risk management, and strategy backtesting. Activates when user asks about stock analysis, trading signals, buy/sell recommendations, market sentiment, portfolio risk, position sizing, stop loss, backtesting, or quantitative strategies. Supports queries like 'analyze AAPL', 'should I buy TSLA', 'market sentiment', 'backtest moving average strategy', 'calculate position size', 'set stop loss'.
